name: Beautification Potion
description: A potion that enhances the drinker's physical appearance, making them more attractive.

name: Felix Felicis
description: Also known as Liquid Luck, this potion grants the drinker a limited period of extraordinary good fortune.

name: Aging Potion
description: A potion that temporarily ages the drinker, making them appear older than they are.

name: Blood Replenishing Potion
description: Used to restore blood lost from injuries; commonly administered at St. Mungo's Hospital.

name: Doxycide
description: A black liquid used to knock out Doxies so they can be safely removed.

name: Polyjuice Potion
description: Allows the drinker to temporarily assume the physical appearance of another person.

name: Amortentia
description: The most powerful love potion in existence; it causes a strong infatuation or obsession.

name: Antidote
description: A general or specific potion used to counteract poisons or other harmful effects of potions.

name: Babbling Beverage
description: Causes the drinker to speak nonsensically or uncontrollably babble.

name: Baruffio's Brain Elixir
description: A potion claimed to boost brain power and enhance mental agility.

name: Boil Cure Potion
description: Cures boils and other skin ailments; one of the first potions taught at Hogwarts.

name: Cough Potion
description: A simple medicinal potion used to relieve coughing and minor throat irritation.

name: Deflating Draught
description: Used to counteract the effects of swelling caused by certain spells or potions.

name: Draught of Peace
description: A calming potion that relieves anxiety, agitation, and depression.

name: Elixir to Induce Euphoria
description: Produces a feeling of great happiness and well-being; known for side effects like excessive singing.

name: Befuddlement Draught
description: Causes confusion and muddled thinking in the drinker.

name: Black Fire Potion
description: A mysterious potion possibly used to create or withstand magical black fire.

name: Draught of Living Death
description: A powerful sleeping potion that places the drinker in a deathlike slumber.

name: Elixir of Life
description: Grants the drinker immortality; created using the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Everlasting Elixirs
description: Potions that never lose their magical effects or expire over time.

name: Veritaserum
description: A powerful truth serum that forces the drinker to reveal the truth when questioned.
